Hereditary	I-SpecificDisease
hemochromatosis	I-SpecificDisease
(HH)	I-SpecificDisease
is	O
a	O
common	O
autosomal	I-DiseaseClass
recessive	I-DiseaseClass
disorder	I-DiseaseClass
characterized	O
by	O
tissue	O
iron	O
deposition	O
secondary	O
to	O
excessive	O
dietary	O
iron	O
absorption.	O
We	O
recently	O
reported	O
that	O
HFE,	O
the	O
protein	O
defective	O
in	O
HH,	I-SpecificDisease
was	O

associated	O
with	O
the	O
transferrin	O
receptor	O
(TfR)	O
in	O
duodenal	O
crypt	O
cells	O
and	O
proposed	O
that	O
mutations	O
in	O
HFE	O
attenuate	O
the	O

of	O

from	O

of	O
transporters	O
for	O
dietary	O
iron.	O

mice	O

increased	O

of	O

vs.	O
49.	O
8%)	O
and	O

concentrations	O
(985	O
micrograms	O
vs.	O
381	O

(IRE),	O

(non-IRE).	O
